titlestmt.author: compiled by Carol King, Nancy Lyon, and staff of Manuscripts and Archives

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Saturday December 8, 2018 at 10:51

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The collection consists of printed material relating to political, economic, and social conditions in Tanzania. Photographs and textiles are also included.

langmaterial.language: The material is in English, Swahili, and Arabic.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Transferred from the African Collection Curator.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Copyright status for collection materials is unknown. Transmission or reproduction of materials protected by U.S. Copyright Law (Title 17, U.S.C.) beyond that allowed by fair use requires the written permission of the copyright owners. Works not in the public domain cannot be commercially exploited without permission of the copyright owners. Responsibility for any use rests exclusively with the user.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Tanzania Collection (MS 1545). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

relatedmaterial.head: Associated Materials
relatedmaterial.p: African Collection (MS 605); Pamphlet Collection (MS 1351); African Postcard Collection (MS 1575). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of printed material relating to political, economic, and social conditions in Tanzania. Photographs and textiles are also included.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The material in the original accession is arranged chronologically, with photographs last. Additions to the collection may vary in arrangement.

did.unittitle: "Arusha: A Brochure of the Northern Province and its Capital Town": commemoration of the first session of the legislative council of the Tanganyika Territory
"The Silver Jubilee of H. H. the Sultan of Zanzibar" and related materials
The Clove Growers Association of Zanzibar: brochures, statements
Tanganyika: general information pamphlets; brochures; booklets from the Tanganyika Information Services (TIS) and the Dar es Salaam City Council
The Tanganyikan : journal of the T.S.D.G. [Tanganyikan Students for a Democratic Government?], Makerere University College
Science/technology (Dar es Salaam Technical College, Tanzania Commission for Science and Technology, Tanzania National Scientific Research Council): magazines, bulletins, statements
Mission to the United Nations, a news service

unittitle.title: USUDIA: magazine of the University Students Union, Dar es Salaam

did.unittitle: Nyerere, Julius K., former president of Tanzania: papers, interviews
General information pamphlets; brochures; booklets; calendars
Afro-Shirazi Party (ASP): reports on the Zanzibar revolution
"The Mirror of Language," The Committee on the Swahili Language, Dar es Salaam University
Agrarian and rural development: magazines, research papers, Dar es Salaam University
Mshindi , Ugamaa Leo , Ulatati : magazines in the Swahili language
Bilal Muslim Mission of Tanzania: journal
"Ijtemah," [Iftitah] ceremony of the Dawoodi Bohra Jamaats
"Amboni Yetu," Amboni Estate Ltd., Africa Office
National Institute of Transport and Tanzania Harbours Authority: programs, journals
Khadija: The Queen of the Arabs , by Akberali G. Dharsi
Institute of Current World Affairs: newsletters
"The Tragedy of Zanzibar," by A. S. Kharusi, Zanzibar Organization
"Elephant Hunting Expedition: German East Africa": photograph album with map and text
"National dance ('Ngoma Khu')" by Wa-Swahili women, E. Africa, Underwood and Underwood Publishers: 2 photographs
Photograph album: Tanzania, Egypt, Kenya, Mozambique

odd.head: General
odd.p: See also: folder 31, Kenya Collection, Manuscript Group Number 1523

did.unittitle: "Address by Mwalimu J. K. Nyerere, Chairman of Chama Cha Mapinduzi at the opening of the National Conference Dodoma, 22nd October 1987"
Hopkins, Raymond F., International Development Research Center, "Constituency Ties and Deviant Expectations Among Tanzanian Legislators"
Leakey, M. D., "Excavation of Burial Mounds in Ngorongoro Crater," reprinted from Tanzania Notes and Records, no. 66, December 1966
Non-Governmental Organisations Coordinating Committee (NGOCC), "NGOCC Newsletter," no. 3
Research on Poverty Alleviation (REPOA), "REPOA Newsletter," no. 1
Rizvi, Sayyid Saeed Akhtar, chief missionary, "Your Questions Answered," vol. 4
"Tanzania Voters' Manifesto for Gender Equality" [English summary of original document in Kiswahili]
The United Republic of Tanzania, "A Guide for Diplomatic Missions"
United States International Communication Agency (USICA) Workshop, "Seminar Review"
Photographs of the sultan of the Chaga Tribe in German military dress and Masai warriors
Beit al-Ajaib, the House of Wonders, Zanzibar [includes photograph]
Travel guide to Dar es Salaam
Photographs of street scenes of Zanzibar
The Graphic [illustrations re slave trade, scenes of Zanzibar]

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This accession consists of printed campaign materials and ephemera pertaining to the candidacy of Jakaya Kikwete (Chama cha Mapinduzi Party) in the 2005 Tanzanian presidential election.

did.unittitle: "Ilani Ya Uchaguzi Ya CCM Kwa Ajili Ya Uchaguzi Mkuu Wa Mwaka"
Fabric [most likely used as banners and/or clothing]

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The material is arranged as received.

did.unittitle: Gender Statistics and Related Issues , 1997 annual publication by the Bureau of Statistics
Women Development for Science and Technology Association (WODSTA)
"Legal and human rights promotion 10 year anniversary"
Masai visit a rural medical center in the Northern Province
